00024 TcpServer::~TcpServer()
00025 {
00026     Disconnect();
00027     Close();
00028
00029     if ( BufferForMultipleClients )
00030     {
00031         delete [] BufferForMultipleClients;
00032         BufferForMultipleClients = NULL;
00033     }
00034 }

00036 void TcpServer::Create(int port)
00037 {
00038     InitForTcpServer(port);
00039     StartThread();
00040 }
00041
00042 void TcpServer::Disconnect()
00043 {
00044     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00045
00046     for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00047     {
00048         delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00049         listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00050     }
00051 }
00052
00053 void TcpServer::Close()
00054 {
00055     StopThread();
00056     GetSocket()->Close();
00057 }
00058
00059 int TcpServer::SendToClient(int len, const char* buf, unsigned int pid)
00060 {
00061     // OmiscidTrace( "TcpServer::SendToClient\n");
00062     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00063
00064     MsgSocket* ms = FindClientFromId(pid);
00065     int nb_send = 0;
00066     if ( ms != (MsgSocket*)NULL )
00067     {
00068         //ms->IsConnected()  : tested by FindClientFromId
00069         try
00070         {
00071             nb_send = ms->Send(len, buf);
00072         }
00073         catch( SocketException &e )
00074         {
00075             OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to %8.8x peer : %s (%d)\n", pid, e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00076         }
00077     }
00078
00079     return nb_send;
00080 }

00083 {
00084     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00085
00086     MsgSocket* ms = FindClientFromId(pid);
00087     int nb_send = 0;
00088
00089     if ( ms != (MsgSocket*)NULL )
00090     {
00091         //ms->IsConnected() tested by FindClientFromId
00092         try
00093         {
00094             nb_send = ms->SendCuttedMsg(tab_len, tab_buf, nb_buf);
00095         }
00096         catch( SocketException &e )
00097         {
00098             OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to %8.8x peer : %s (%d)\n", pid, e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00099         }
00100     }
00101
00102     return nb_send;
00103 }

00105 int TcpServer::SendToAllClients(int len, const char* buf)
00106 {
00107     int nb_clients = 0;
00108     int TotalLen;
00109     MsgSocket * ms;
00110
00111     // Check if we have someone to serve
00112     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00113
00114     if ( listConnections.GetNumberOfElements() == 0 )
00115     {
00116         return 0;
00117     }
00118
00119     SmartLocker SL_ProtectedSend(ProtectedSend);
00120
00121     // If message is too big, we do not try to do optimisation
00122     if ( len > maxBIPMessageSize )
00123     {
00124         for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00125         {
00126             ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00127             if( ms->IsConnected() )
00128             {
00129                 try
00130                 {
00131                     ms->Send(len, buf);
00132                     nb_clients++;
00133                 }
00134                 catch( SocketException &e )
00135                 {
00136                     OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to all peers : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00137                 }
00138             }
00139             else
00140             {
00141                 listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00142                 delete ms;
00143             }
00144         }
00145
00146         return nb_clients;
00147     }
00148
00149     TotalLen = MsgSocket::PrepareBufferForBip( BufferForMultipleClients, buf, len );
00150     if ( TotalLen == -1 )
00151     {
00152         return -1;
00153     }
00154
00155     for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00156     {
00157         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00158         if( ms->IsConnected() )
00159         {
00160             try
00161             {
00162                 ms->SendPreparedBuffer(TotalLen, BufferForMultipleClients);
00163                 nb_clients++;
00164             }
00165             catch( SocketException &e )
00166             {
00167                 OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to all peers : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00168             }
00169         }
00170         else
00171         {
00172             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00173             delete ms;
00174         }
00175     }
00176
00177     return nb_clients;
00178 }

00180 int TcpServer::SendToAllClients(int* tab_len, const char** tab_buf, int nb_buf)
00181 {
00182     int nb_clients = 0;
00183     int TotalLen;
00184     int i;
00185     MsgSocket * ms;
00186
00187     // Check if we have someone to serve
00188     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00189
00190     if ( listConnections.GetNumberOfElements() == 0 )
00191     {
00192         return 0;
00193     }
00194
00195     for( i = 0, TotalLen = 0; i < nb_buf; i++ )
00196     {
00197         TotalLen += tab_len[0];
00198     }
00199
00200     // If message is too big, we do not try to do optimisation
00201     if ( TotalLen > maxBIPMessageSize )
00202     {
00203         for( listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00204         {
00205             ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00206             if( ms->IsConnected() )
00207             {
00208                 try
00209                 {
00210                     ms->SendCuttedMsg(tab_len, tab_buf, nb_buf );
00211                     nb_clients++;
00212                 }
00213                 catch( SocketException &e )
00214                 {
00215                     OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to all peers : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00216                 }
00217             }
00218             else
00219             {
00220                 listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00221                 delete ms;
00222             }
00223         }
00224
00225         return nb_clients;
00226     }
00227
00228     SmartLocker SL_ProtectedSend(ProtectedSend);
00229
00230     TotalLen = MsgSocket::PrepareBufferForBipFromCuttedMsg( BufferForMultipleClients, tab_len, tab_buf, nb_buf);
00231     if ( TotalLen == -1 )
00232     {
00233         return -1;
00234     }
00235
00236     for( listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00237     {
00238         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00239         if( ms->IsConnected() )
00240         {
00241             try
00242             {
00243                 ms->SendPreparedBuffer(TotalLen, BufferForMultipleClients);
00244                 nb_clients++;
00245             }
00246             catch( SocketException &e )
00247             {
00248                 OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to all peers : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00249             }
00250         }
00251         else
00252         {
00253             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00254             delete ms;
00255         }
00256     }
00257
00258     return nb_clients;
00259 }

00262 int TcpServer::GetNbConnections()
00263 {
00264     MsgSocket * ms;
00265
00266     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00267
00268     for( listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next())
00269     {
00270         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00271         if( ms->IsConnected() == false )
00272         {
00273             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00274             delete ms;
00275         }
00276     }
00277
00278     int nb = (int)listConnections.GetNumberOfElements();
00279
00280     return nb;
00281 }

00283 bool TcpServer::AcceptConnection(MsgSocket* sock)
00284 {
00285     // OmiscidTrace( "in TcpServer::acceptConnection(MsgSocket*) %u\n", sock->GetPeerPid());
00286
00287     // OmiscidTrace( "TcpServer::AcceptConnection:: connection from (%s)\n", sock->GetSocket()->GetConnectedHost().GetStr());
00288
00289     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00290
00291     // Init the socket
00292     // REVIEW: Inherit my SyndLink data
00293     SmartLocker SL_mutex(mutex);
00294
00295     if ( SyncLinkData.GetLength() != 0 )
00296     {
00297         sock->SetSyncLinkData( SyncLinkData  );
00298     }
00299     // If we have a fonction set to process LincSyncData, set it to the opened connection
00300     if ( callbackSyncLinkFct )
00301     {
00302         sock->SetCallbackSyncLink( callbackSyncLinkFct, callbackSyncLinkData.userData1, callbackSyncLinkData.userData2 );
00303     }
00304     SL_mutex.Unlock();
00305
00306     // Add all my listener to the new socket
00307     SmartLocker SL_CallbackObjects(CallbackObjects);
00308     for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00309     {
00310         // Add this listener
00311         sock->AddCallbackObject( CallbackObjects.GetCurrent() );
00312     }
00313     SL_CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00314
00315     sock->SetTcpNoDelay(TcpNoDelayMode);
00316     sock->SetName(GetName());
00317     sock->SetServiceId(GetServiceId());
00318     sock->SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(MsgSocket::GetMaxMessageSizeForTCP());
00319     sock->StartThread();
00320
00321     listConnections.Add(sock);
00322     SL_listConnections.Unlock();
00323
00324     // Send empty message information
00325     sock->SendSyncLinkMsg();
00326
00327     return true;
00328 }
00329
00330 bool TcpServer::AddCallbackObject(MsgSocketCallbackObject * CallbackObject)
00331 {
00332     if ( MsgSocket::AddCallbackObject( CallbackObject ) == false )
00333     {
00334         return false;
00335     }
00336
00337     MsgSocket* ms;
00338     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00339     for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00340     {
00341         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00342         if( ms->IsConnected() )
00343         {
00344             ms->AddCallbackObject( CallbackObject );
00345         }
00346         else
00347         {
00348             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00349             delete ms;
00350         }
00351     }
00352
00353     return true;
00354 }

00406 int TcpServer::GetListPeerId(SimpleList<unsigned int>& list_peer)
00407 {
00408     MsgSocket * ms;
00409     int nb = 0;
00410
00411     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00412     for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00413     {
00414         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00415         if( ms->IsConnected() == false )
00416         {
00417             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00418             delete ms;
00419         }
00420         else
00421         {
00422             list_peer.Add(ms->GetPeerPid());
00423             nb++;
00424         }
00425     }
00426     return nb;
00427 }

00429 void TcpServer::SetServiceId(unsigned int pid)
00430 {
00431     // Check validity of a service Id
00432     if ( (pid & ComTools::CONNECTOR_ID) == 0 )
00433     {
00434         // pid = pid | 0xffffff01;
00435 #ifdef DEBUG
00436         //              fprintf( stderr, "Warning: ConnectorId could not be 0 for TcpServer. Value changes to 1 (PeerId = %8.8x)\n", pid );
00437 #endif
00438     }
00439     MsgSocket::SetServiceId(pid);
00440
00441     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00442     for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00443     {
00444         if( listConnections.GetCurrent()->IsConnected() )
00445         {
00446             listConnections.GetCurrent()->SetServiceId(pid);
00447         }
00448         else
00449         {
00450             delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00451             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00452         }
00453     }
00454 }

00464             listConnections.GetCurrent()->SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(max);

00472
00473 MsgSocket* TcpServer::FindClientFromId(unsigned int id)
00474 {
00475     MsgSocket * ms;
00476
00477     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00478     for( listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00479     {
00480         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00481         if( *ms == id )
00482         {
00483             if( ms->IsConnected() )
00484             {
00485                 return ms;
00486             }
00487             else
00488             {
00489                 delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00490                 listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00491                 // look forward to look if there is not another pid
00492             }
00493         }
00494     }
00495
00496     unsigned int SearchId = id & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID;
00497
00498     for( listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00499     {
00500         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00501         if( SearchId == (ms->GetPeerPid() & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID) )
00502         {
00503             if ( ms->IsConnected() )
00504             {
00505                 return ms;
00506             }
00507         }
00508     }
00509
00510     return NULL;
00511 }
00512
00514 bool TcpServer::DisconnectPeerId(unsigned int PeerId)
00515 {
00516     MsgSocket * ms;
00517     bool ret = false;
00518     unsigned int SearchId = PeerId & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID;
00519
00520     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00521     for( listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00522     {
00523         ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00524         if( ms->IsConnected() == false )
00525         {
00526             delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00527             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00528             continue;
00529         }
00530
00531         if ( SearchId == (ms->GetPeerPid() & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID) )
00532         {
00533             delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00534             listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00535             ret = true;
00536             continue;
00537         }
00538     }
00539
00540     return ret;
00541 }
00542
00543 bool TcpServer::SetTcpNoDelay(bool Set)
00544 {
00545     bool ReturnCode = true;
00546
00547     if ( Set == TcpNoDelayMode )
00548         return true;
00549
00550     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00551
00552     TcpNoDelayMode = Set;
00553
00554     for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00555     {
00556         ReturnCode = ReturnCode & listConnections.GetCurrent()->SetTcpNoDelay(TcpNoDelayMode);
00557     }
00558
00559     return ReturnCode;
00560 }

00582 bool TcpServer::IsStillConnected(unsigned int peer_id)
00583 {
00584     bool res = false;
00585     SmartLocker SL_listConnections(listConnections);
00586
00587     res = FindClientFromId(peer_id) != NULL;
00588
00589     return res;
00590 }
